fmiModelDescription.generationTool: Dymola Version 2017 FD01 (64-bit), 2016-10-11 (requires license to execute)

Item.name: NoInit
Item.description: No initialization (start values are used as guess values with fixed=false)

Item.name: SteadyState
Item.description: Steady state initialization (derivatives of states are zero)

Item.name: InitialOutput
Item.description: Initialization with initial outputs (and steady state of the states if possible)

ScalarVariable.name: delay[1,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Delay of the system for every transfer function

ScalarVariable.name: delay[1,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Delay of the system for every transfer function

ScalarVariable.name: delay[2,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Delay of the system for every transfer function

ScalarVariable.name: delay[2,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Delay of the system for every transfer function

ScalarVariable.name: b[1,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Set Point Weight of the controller

ScalarVariable.name: b[1,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Set Point Weight of the controller

ScalarVariable.name: b[2,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Set Point Weight of the controller

ScalarVariable.name: b[2,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Set Point Weight of the controller

ScalarVariable.name: System.n
ScalarVariable.description: Number of inputs (= number of outputs)

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[1].b[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Numerator coefficients of transfer function (e.g., 2*s+3 is specified as {2,3})

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[1].a[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Denominator coefficients of transfer function (e.g., 5*s+6 is specified as {5,6})

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[1].a[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Denominator coefficients of transfer function (e.g., 5*s+6 is specified as {5,6})

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[1].initType
ScalarVariable.description: Type of initialization (1: no init, 2: steady state, 3: initial state, 4: initial output)

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[1].x_start[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess values of states

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[1].y_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial value of output (derivatives of y are zero up to nx-1-th derivative)

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[1].x[1]
ScalarVariable.description: State of transfer function from controller canonical form

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[2].b[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Numerator coefficients of transfer function (e.g., 2*s+3 is specified as {2,3})

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[2].a[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Denominator coefficients of transfer function (e.g., 5*s+6 is specified as {5,6})

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[2].a[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Denominator coefficients of transfer function (e.g., 5*s+6 is specified as {5,6})

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[2].initType
ScalarVariable.description: Type of initialization (1: no init, 2: steady state, 3: initial state, 4: initial output)

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[2].x_start[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess values of states

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[2].y_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial value of output (derivatives of y are zero up to nx-1-th derivative)

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].transferFunction[2].x[1]
ScalarVariable.description: State of transfer function from controller canonical form

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].add.significantDigits
ScalarVariable.description: Number of significant digits to be shown in dynamic diagram layer for y

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].fixedDelay[1].delayTime
ScalarVariable.description: Delay time of output with respect to input signal

ScalarVariable.name: System.miso[1].fixedDelay[2].delayTime
ScalarVariable.description: Delay time of output with respect to input signal

ScalarVariable.description: Denominator coefficients of transfer function (e.g., 5*s+6 is specified as {5,6})

ScalarVariable.description: Denominator coefficients of transfer function (e.g., 5*s+6 is specified as {5,6})

ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess values of states

ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess values of states

ScalarVariable.description: State of transfer function from controller canonical form

ScalarVariable.description: Delay time of output with respect to input signal

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.n
ScalarVariable.description: Number of inputs (= number of outputs)

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].add.significantDigits
ScalarVariable.description: Number of significant digits to be shown in dynamic diagram layer for y

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].u
ScalarVariable.description: Differenz between setpoint and measurement aka control error

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].invertFeedback
ScalarVariable.description: true, if feedback Modelica.SIUnitsgnal is inverted

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].offset
ScalarVariable.description: Operating point, added to proportional output

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].use_kInput
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if k defined by input

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].use_TiInput
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if Ti defined by input

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].use_kiInput
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if ki defined by input

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].use_activeInput
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if controller is switched on/off externally

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].use_y_notActive
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if output of not activated controller is defined externally. Otherwise output is hold at deactivation.

ScalarVariable.name: Decentral_Controller.pi[1].pIController_sw[1].activationTime
ScalarVariable.description: Time when controller is switched on
